n = int(input())
t = input()
s = ""
for i in range(n, 0, -1):
    if n % i == 0:
        s += t[i-1::i][::-1]
        t = t[:i-1] + s[-i:] + t[i:]
print(s)


n = int(input())
t = input()
s = [0]*n

for i in range(n-1, 0, -1):
  x = n // i
  y = n % i
  if y == 0:
    for j in range(x):
      s[i * j] = t[i * (x - 1 - j)]
  else:
    for j in range(x+1):
      s[y + i * j] = t[y + i * (x - j)]

print(''.join(s))



def main():
    n = int(input())
    t = input()
    s = list(t)
    for i in range(n, 0, -1):
        if n%i == 0:
            for j in range(i):
                s[j::i] = t[j::i][::-1] 
            t = ''.join(s) 
    print(s)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

def main():
    n = int(input())
    t = input()
    s = ['']*n
    for i in range(n, 0, -1):
        if n%i == 0:
            for j in range(i):
                s[j::i] = t[j::i][::-1]
            t = ''.join(s)
    print(s)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

def main():
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    t = ''
    for i in range(n, 0, -1):
        if n%i == 0:
            for j in range(i):
                t += s[j::i][::-1]
            s = t
    print(t)



if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()



def main():
    n = int(input())
    t = input()
    s = ['']*n
    for i in range(n, 1, -1):
        if n%i == 0:
            s[::i] = t[::i][::-1]
            t = ''.join(s)
    print(s)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

# SOLUTION

n = int(input())
t = input()

s = [0]*n

for i in range(n-1, 0, -1):
  x = n//i
  y = n%i
  if y==0:
    for j in range(x):
      s[i*j] = t[i*(x-1-j)]
  else:
    for j in range(x+1):
      s[y+i*j] = t[y+i*(x-j)]

print(''.join(s))

# solution

n = int(input())
t = input()

s = [0]*n

for i in range(n-1, 0, -1): # from n-1 to 1
  x = n//i
  y = n%i
  if y==0:
    for j in range(x): # x times
      s[i*j] = t[i*(x-1-j)] # i * (x-1-j) is the index of the last char in the j-th block
  else:
    for j in range(x+1): # x+1 times
      s[y+i*j] = t[y+i*(x-j)] # y+i*(x-j) is the index of the last char in the j-th block

print(''.join(s))
#!/usr/bin/env python3

n = int(input())
t = input()
s = ""
for i in range(n, 0, -1):
    if n % i == 0:
        s += t[i-1::i][::-1]
        t = t[:i-1] + s[-i:] + t[i:]
print(s)
